- **Gene Name:** plasmodesmata-located protein 2

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_118839C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;This mutant does not show any obvious abnormal growth or developmental phenotype.
   - [pdlp2-1 / pdlp3-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The movement of GFP between cells is increased in this double mutant.
